name: BURNT NUTZ
description:
A 2-player squirel game! survive the longest and throw Molotov cocktails at each other! 

controls:

Player1:
move: 'WASD',
jump: 'c',
throw: 'v'

Player2:  
move: 'IJKL', 
jump: '.'
throw: '/'

This was an entry for the Butterscotch Shenanijam , it was made in 48 hours.
